00022 QWidget* ActiveViewDelegate::createEditor( QWidget* parent, 
00023                                                                                   const QStyleOptionViewItem& option, 
00024                                                                                   const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00025 
00026         if (index.column() == 1) {
00027                 QComboBox* comboBox = new QComboBox(parent);
00028                 return comboBox;
00029         }
00030         else
00031                 return QStyledItemDelegate::createEditor(parent, option, index);
00032 }
00033 
00034 void ActiveViewDelegate::setEditorData( QWidget* editor, const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00035 
00036         if (index.column() == 1) {
00037                 QComboBox* comboBox = qobject_cast<QComboBox*>(editor);
00038                 Q_ASSERT(comboBox);
00039 
00040                 // add the possible values for the combo box
00041                 QStringList viewNames = index.model()->data(index, Qt::UserRole).toStringList();
00042                 comboBox->clear();
00043                 comboBox->addItems(viewNames);
00044                 
00045                 // find the index of the currently selected item and set it as current.
00046                 QString current = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00047                 int selectedIndex = comboBox->findText(current);
00048                 comboBox->setCurrentIndex(selectedIndex);
00049         }
00050         else 
00051                 QStyledItemDelegate::setEditorData(editor, index);
00052 }
00053 
00054 void ActiveViewDelegate::setModelData( QWidget* editor, QAbstractItemModel* model, 
00055                                                                           const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00056                                                                                   
00057         if (index.column() == 1) {
00058                 QComboBox* comboBox = qobject_cast<QComboBox*>(editor);
00059                 Q_ASSERT(comboBox);
00060 
00061                 QString text = comboBox->currentText();
00062                 model->setData(index, text, Qt::EditRole);
00063         }
00064         else 
00065                 QStyledItemDelegate::setModelData(editor, model, index);
00066 }
